sample_npc_interact1.String: "What it do, big guy? Haven't seen you in ages. How have you been? How are your kids? What's the deal? What's the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow?"

sample_npc_branching.String: "Anyway, it was nice talking to you."

npc_gift_worst.String: "Is this a joke? Get that out of my face."

npc_gift_hated.String: "Hey, I know you mean well, but I hate those."

npc_gift_best.String: "I don't know how you knew, but I really, REALLY love these. Thank you so much!"
